title: Sound On: Heated MI Primary, Manchin Thwarts WH Eco Agenda (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Heated MI Primary, Manchin Thwarts WH Eco Agenda (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guest host Emily Wilkins was joined by Rep. Andy Levin, (D-Michigan) on the congressional agenda, U.S. House staffers plans to unionize and his primary race against Rep. Haley Stevens. Bloomberg Government election reporter Greg Giroux discusses Maryland's primary election races. Plus, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discuss the Levin/Stevens primary race in Michigan, the next steps for a slimmed down reconciliation bill and the impact of gas prices starting to come down.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
